applications.name: Pnyws (PennyWise): An expense tracker.

applications.name: Lumia NG
applications.description:
Lumia is a power vending platform that helps Nigerians pay both for prepaid and postpaid electricity bills from the comfort of their homes and offices.

Lumia makes electricity payments easy, with a unique three tap experience.
